sentences.en: Can also be used as a colander for rinsing vegetables, spaghetti and noodles.
sentences.cn: 可作为滤筛,冲洗蔬菜 、 意大利粉或面等.

sentences.en: Drain in a colander, reserving 1 cup cooking water.
sentences.cn: 取出面条, 过滤水分,留下一杯煮面条的水.

sentences.en: Mr Colander asked a group of Chicago students.
She took a colander and, of course, first of all we would wash the lettuce, that goes without saying.
sentences.cn: 她会找一个滤锅,当然，先洗菜。

sentences.en: Simply place a dry coffee filter in a clean drip coffee filter basket or colander, and place the basket or colander over a clean dry pitcher or bowl.
sentences.cn: 只需将一个干的咖啡滤纸放在干净的滤器中，然后将滤器放在干的干净水罐或碗上即可。

sentences.en: The debris can be separated from the anthers with a colander of proper mesh size.
sentences.cn: 使用适当大小网眼的滤器可把碎片与花药分开.

sentences.en: When you have boiled the cabbage, strain off the water through the colander.
sentences.cn: 煮完白菜后, 用滤锅把水滤去.

sentences.en: When you've boiled the cabbage, strain off the water through a colander.
sentences.cn: 你把卷心菜煮开后, 用滤锅把水滤掉.

sentences.en: When you've boiled the cabbage, strain off the water through a colander.
sentences.cn: 当你把卷心菜煮开后, 用漏勺把水滤掉.

trans.tran_en: a metal or plastic bowl with a lot of small holes in the bottom and sides, used to separate liquid from food
